```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(plotly)
```


## Assisted Living Facilities

```{r, warning=FALSE}
Facilities <- read.csv("Assisted_Living_Facilities.csv")

plot_ly(Facilities, y = ~Facilities$councilDistrict, 
        color = ~Facilities$policeDistrict, type = "box")
```


## Datasource

[Open Baltimore - Assisted Living Facilities](https://data.baltimorecity.gov/Health/Assisted-Living-Facilities/q2vm-e9dp)
